You still have to get the sign in screen to accept terms and conditions for hotels & this does not allow that connection.

review: I bought this so my parents could watch Netflix on their TV and they absolutely love it. They said it took just a couple of minutes to put it into the TV and get the Chrome Extension to allow it to show what was on their laptop screen, and these are parents who dislike anything technological because they assume it's too hard for them to do.
